name: An (in)human work
tagline: Somebody else is also pulling the strings.
body:
### Wor(l)ds collide
Two sayan teenagers become stranded in Tokyo-3. Now they'll face the usual conspirations before even thinking of going home. 

### Differeces
Follow the ripples that washed any sliver of normalcy away from an already devastated world. Is there a cause?

***

### Just another Evangelion crossover fanfic
This story comes from a fanfic I've begun to write circa 2003, but left unfinished in Portuguese. The translation (and some original work) will be hosted here.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
